channel.title: Unreal
channel.description: Discussion about the original Unreal, released in 1998.

item.title: Peace in our time!
item.author: invalid@example.com (evilgrins)
item.dc:creator: evilgrins
item.content:encoded:
Has anyone ever stopped to consider that the main reason there's such conflict between humans & Skaarj is that we call them monsters? I mean, they're really just aliens. Non-human beings from other planets.

Nobody calls Superman a monster... well, nobody that isn't Lex Luthor.

Sure, there's been a lot of conflict with the Skaarj and sure... they kinda like eating humans, but can't we just get past that?

Can't we all just get along??

item.title: Custom Skybox textures

item.title: The Krall Hierarchy
item.author: invalid@example.com (Leo(T.C.K.))
item.dc:creator: Leo(T.C.K.)
item.content:encoded:
I wanted to write this down, a fictional rundown/hierarchy of the Krall mostly based on pre-released material and what's known, these are the types outside normal Krall/KrallElite.

Many of these as such will appear in unreal psx episode 1 part 2.

The Krall Minotaur: These primitive beasts are like what great apes are to mankind, except here to Krall.

The Savage Krall: These are the UT3 iteration of the Krall, clearly drawing inspiration from the minotaur/gargoyle. They use whatever they...

The Krall Hierarchy

item.title: Unreal Characters + SLV Papercraft
item.author: invalid@example.com (Metalfist)
item.dc:creator: Metalfist
item.content:encoded:
Hey I'm back with not one, but two papercraft projects! Habouji!

Unreal Characters Papercraft

Remember how Prisoner 849 crashed on Na Pali and defeated the skaarj queen? Now you can make your very own prisoners from the Vortex Rikers and Nali from paper! Habouji! Just print, cut and glue the parts together!
For more + download:...

Unreal Characters + SLV Papercraft

item.title: Crispy Skins.... (OU227 only)
item.author: invalid@example.com (Leo(T.C.K.))
item.dc:creator: Leo(T.C.K.)
item.content:encoded:
BurnedCarcassRls.rar
This is a skin modifier based on a seen Unreal beta behavior. Details in the readme. This is for extra crispy fun. reat in combination with napalm/flamethrower weapons that do the Burned type damage.

item.title: Unreal 95 / 97 Alpha Research
item.author: invalid@example.com (Leo(T.C.K.))
item.dc:creator: Leo(T.C.K.)
item.content:encoded:
Since I just received a package of old unreal screenshots/videos and other stuff, I thought of uploading this on youtube:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4yHh35ghbuw

Also, really really old preview shots, earlier than the famous 95 tech demo it seems:
3.rar
It seems it has Gargoyle too. It wasn't dragon then at all, unlike what some thought.

item.title: Unreal and Windows 8
item.author: invalid@example.com (Freddie)
item.dc:creator: Freddie
item.content:encoded:
Hey All,

Anyone run Unreal in Windows 8 yet? Does is work?

Freddie

item.title: Unreal in Windows 10
item.author: invalid@example.com (Freddie)
item.dc:creator: Freddie
item.content:encoded:
Hey,

I installed Windows 10 upgrade on my Win8.1 PC, which contained many games, including Unreal and Unreal Tournament. Initially, Neither Unreal nor Unreal Tournament would function. I experimented with various settings in their Properties settings. Eventually, I found some settings that enabled them to function normally.

Take a look at the picture of the Properties. Both Unreal and Unreal Tournament Properties are configured as you see in the picture. Notice how the screen...

Unreal in Windows 10

item.title: Unreal Archives
item.author: invalid@example.com (MakeMeUnreal)
item.dc:creator: MakeMeUnreal
item.content:encoded:
​
Unrealarchives.com, was launched in February 2014 with the primary goal of keeping all user-built single player content for Unreal, RTNP and Unreal Tournament consistently accessible and downloadable to everyone. We hope that our existence will make a modest but valuable contribution to keeping the 15+ year old Unreal single player community...

Unreal Archives

item.title: [U227][UT]Unreal: Resurgence Part 1
item.author: invalid@example.com (AlCapowned)
item.dc:creator: AlCapowned
item.content:encoded:
Developers: Teridax, AlCapowned, Doublez-Down, Tronovision
Status: Developing

Synopsis: It is approximately 22 years after the Skaarj Empire's humiliating defeat at the hands of humanity in the 7 Day Siege. The Empire has been struggling to maintain their grip on Na Pali ever since, as human and alien mercenaries alike gleefully tear away at the rest of the Empire's resources.

After the deaths of all personel situated near a string of Nali temples dedicated to the god...

[U227][UT]Unreal: Resurgence Part 1

item.title: Where are the other nali?
item.author: invalid@example.com (NeoNite)
item.dc:creator: NeoNite
item.content:encoded:
Most people who've played this game probably noticed this. Others most likely didn't heed these cretins much, except when blowing them to bits and pieces (because these suckers had the tendency to run in front of your fire)

But where are the nali women, and children? Obviously there have to be! ...
There's this goddess they're worshipping. A goddess named Vandora.
She has four arms and equally as many bewbs.

So, there's the female nali. And the other nali, who are obviously all...

Where are the other nali?

item.title: SpringBoard release
item.author: invalid@example.com (Leo(T.C.K.))
item.dc:creator: Leo(T.C.K.)
item.content:encoded:
SpringBoard

Made by CodeX with input and testing by me and zeurkous. It took a while to fix everything up but here it is.

The mesh was originally made for the game The Circle, a cancelled game on the Unreal Engine, so this is from whatever little was rescued(as there was more and some meshes had missing data files etc and the game itself wasn't there).

It was an RPG game that also had some elements later reused...

SpringBoard release

item.title: What's on a Titan's menu...
item.author: invalid@example.com (NeoNite)
item.dc:creator: NeoNite
item.content:encoded:
Seeing how big these bastards are. What's the required doses of meat every day. What's on the menu, their favourite food?

Could be those nali, but they get smashed to bits and pieces most of the times. Maybe their fat cattle?

Skaarj exrecement?

Or do they get nutrition from their armpits somehow?

item.title: SMIRFTSCH IS A TEXTURE-MAPPED POLYGONAL CHARACTER
item.author: invalid@example.com (Leo(T.C.K.))
item.dc:creator: Leo(T.C.K.)
item.content:encoded:
IN THIS UNBELIEVABLE QUAKE-BEATER! </advertisement>

REALSMIRFDEMO

Yes...I made a real Smirf character this time in Unreal 95. Rebuilt under the November 1995 demo, this map works both on the november and december 95 tech demos of Unreal...
Switch to him using brackets and you can use behindview too and watch him RUN.

I'm not sure whether this is the right place for this...

I mean no offence, in fact this is a...

SMIRFTSCH IS A TEXTURE-MAPPED POLYGONAL CHARACTER

item.title: Unreal Beta Weapons Papercraft
item.author: invalid@example.com (Metalfist)
item.dc:creator: Metalfist
item.content:encoded:
Here's the pack with Unreal Beta weapons by request from Leo. These models and textures were from the Unreal betas before release and the translocator is from the Unreal Tournament beta. These were pretty hard to get, but Leo helped me by providing these models, so thank you for that! Just print, cut and glue them together. You can scale them to your liking using pepakura Designer (you see the dimensions in there) and apply different textures if you want. They are currently scaled towards...

Unreal Beta Weapons Papercraft

item.title: Dave Carter's Unreal models?
item.author: invalid@example.com (AlCapowned)
item.dc:creator: AlCapowned
item.content:encoded:
Dave Carter, Unreal's lead animator, used to host the sources of some of his Unreal models (like the Skaarj and Brute) on nervedamage.com, as seen here: https://web.archive.org/web/19991104133441/http://www.nervedamage.com/models.html

I would love to have these. I know it's a long shot, but does anyone here have them?

item.title: Unreal Weapons Papercraft
item.author: invalid@example.com (Metalfist)
item.dc:creator: Metalfist
item.content:encoded:
Remember Unreal and the awesome weapons? You can now make your very own Unreal weapons! Just print, cut and glue them together. You can scale them to your liking using pepakura Designer (you see the dimensions in there) and apply different textures I included if you want. All the evolutions of the Dispersion Pistol are also included! They are are scaled properly towards each other, but not the other instructables.

You will need Pepakura software in order to open the .pdo files.
You...

Unreal Weapons Papercraft

item.title: Gargoyle release
item.author: invalid@example.com (Leo(T.C.K.))
item.dc:creator: Leo(T.C.K.)
item.content:encoded:
PSXGargoyle.rar

The (in)famous 1995 Unreal Gargoyle finished up for release. I wanted to preserve this for when I release the next part of the Unreal PSX rework, but realistically that's still gonna take a while. So here you go, enjoy.
